channel.title: Homes on GREAT
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on GREAT

item.description: Biography Welcome to my homepage. I’m currently an associate professor at Shanghai University. I received my B.E., Ph.D. and postdoc degrees from the EE department at Tsinghua University, China in 2015 and 2010, respectively. My advisor was Prof. Zhisheng Niu from Niulab, Tsinghua University. I visited the WiDeS group at University of Southern California from September 2013 to April 2014, advised by Prof. A. F. Molisch and Prof. Giuseppe Caire.

item.title: Services
item.description: Editorial board IEEE/KICS Journal of Communications and Networks TPC member IEEE DySPAN 2018, PIMRC 2015, PIMRC 2017, APCC 2017, WPMC 2017, SigTelCom 2018 Invited reviewer IEEE Tran. Netw., IEEE J. Select. Area Commun., IEEE IoT J., IEEE Tran. Wireless Commun., IEEE Tran. Commun., IEEE Tran. Veh. Tech., IEEE Tran. Signal. Process., IEEE Wireless Commun. Mag., IEEE Commun. Mag., IEEE CL, IEEE WCL, Mobihoc, IEEE ICC, GLOBECOM, WCNC, VTC…

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I was a teaching assistant for the following courses at Tsinghua University: Advanced linear algebra Queuing Theory I also organized studying groups on Markov decision process Reinforcement learning Deep learning

item.title: Personal
item.description: I played for the THU team from 2010 to 2015. We won the champion of Beijing College in 2009, 2010, 2011, 2013, 2014, 2016 and 2017, and the China College Baseball champion in 2009 (shared) at Guilin, 2013 at Tianjin, 2014 at Wuxi and 2015 at Dalian (shared). My favorate MLB baseball club is Boston Redsox. For my blog in Chinese, please click here.
